structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.history: Repealed 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 314, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 70. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3543, 3544a-1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Tax bills, how made out and delivered in cities of fourth class.
